lead_paragraph: Marat Safin, a former United States Open and Australian Open champion, was eliminated in the first round of the Cincinnati Masters, losing, 6-3, 7-6, to Nicolas Kiefer.Eleventh-seeded Ivan Ljubicic recovered from a poor start to beat Amer Delic, 1-6, 7-6, 6-3, and No. 13 Mikhail Youzhny crushed Dominik Hrbaty, 6-3, 6-1. Carlos Moyá, the winner in 2002, defeated David Nalbandian, 7-6, 7-6.
